participant_1.name: Jessica
participant_1.personality: Energetic and fitness-oriented, loves outdoor activities and has a positive outlook on life.
participant_1.background: i have short hair. two dogs live with me. i like doing the treadmill and rowing machine. i go to the gym regularly.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Reflective and resilient, has a deep appreciation for nature and a strong sense of community.
participant_2.background: i now live in the city. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i am a recovering alcoholic. i grew up on a farm.
